main.name: Mohtasim Hadi Rafi
main.description: I am a web development engineer and I use react and angular to develop pages. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Passed with a GPA-5 and talentpool scholarship.

work.title: Mathematics Instructor
work.description: This is a secondary school in Bhaktapur, Nepal. I worked as an instructor of Mathematics for 9th and 10th grade students.
